name: RIFPro
description: RIFPro (RIFP) is a token on the Rootstock blockchain (the longest-standing Bitcoin L2) powering the Bitcoin DeFi ecosystem. By design, RIFPro interacts with RIF On Chain's infrastructure—absorbing and redistributing volatility (a leveraged asset)—to create a system where RIF’s price movements are slightly magnified. Think of it as RIF, enhanced by RoC’s protocol-driven adjustments to balance collateralization and system behavior.
